artist: Virgil Ortiz, Tamarind Institute, Albuquerque, New Mexico, Gallery Hózhó, Albuquerque, New Mexico
creditline: Gift of funds from Tamara and Michael Root
markings: Artist, workshop, and publisher chop marks, LLC Numbered in pencil, LLC: 13/15
text: A figure looking down with a gas mask on face and a head piece with long hair like fringe. The figure has no shirt, gloves that reach up to elbows. Bottom clothing is a skirt or pants. Fists are clenched holding two dangling fringes. On figure's back is a bow and arrow within a case. A red triangle appears at the center.
title: Lee-Tho, Recon of the North Realm Spine Watchman
